dict.string: The app accesses the media drive to store data files
The app uses bluetooth to communicate with instruments. This is necessary for the app to communicate with the devices.
The app uses bluetooth to communicate with instruments. This is necessary for the app to communicate with the devices.

Location data is used by the app to map the location where data was recoreded. For example, when on a trek the app will record the location a reading was recorded. This data is included when exporting measurement data.

Location data is used by the app to map the location where data was recoreded. For example, when on a trek the app will record the location a reading was recorded. This data is included when exporting measurement data. This also allows the app to collect data if running in the background.
Used as an option when exporting data files
Used as an option when exporting data files
